name: MathRules
0:
”Alexa, open Math Rules.”
”Tell me the Product Rule.”
skdetail:

Invocation Name: math rules
des: A skill to remind you of common math rules and theorems. Ask Alexa to explain the Product Rule, or to quote Pythagoras' Theorem!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
